description.brief: generic data logger component for orogen-generated packages

package.description:
This software package contains the implementation of a generic high-performance logging component for orogen-generated packages. It is able to log the output ports of orogen components with very little overhead.
The generated log file can be read with the pocolog Ruby library.
package.author: Sylvain Joyeux/sylvain.joyeux@m4x.org
